job.title: DATA - Sr. Data Engineer
job.description: the senior data engineer will work in a truly agile environment with a local and virtual team of engineers and play a key role in providing the endtoend data engineering solutions to support key business initiativesltbrgtltbrgtthe ideal candidate has deep expertise in the design creation management and business use of large datasets across a variety of data platforms with excellent business and interpersonal skills to be able to work with business owners to understand data requirements and to build etl to ingest the data the candidate should be an authority at crafting implementing and operating stable scalable lowcost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data lakeltbrgtltbrgtas a senior data engineer you will develop new data engineering patterns extend or migrate existing data pipelines you will be responsible for designing and implementing the complex etl pipelines building other bi solutions to support the rapidly growing and dynamic business demand for data and have an immediate influence on daytoday decision makingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtjob qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthis position requires a bachelors degree in data analytics computer science or a related technical field and years of meaningful employment experienceltbrgtltulgtltligt years of relevant work experience in data engineering etl data modeling and data architectureltligtltligt expertlevel skills in writing and optimizing sqlltligtltligt experience with data technologies in particular with azure data factoryltligtltligt proficiency in the scripting languages javascript python or similarltbrgtltligtltulgt
